component.description: The first requirement of the assignment was to model the potential system's database and figure out how to store the data about individual wines and regions (name, type, alchohol, colour intensity, description, price, suppliers, image etc. etc.) As how the relationship between them. Fo ou first meeting as a group we met up and went over the design.
component.problems: The only problems or issues which we faced with the design where that of having to modify the model depending on database implementation. And on representing enumeration classes.
component.solutions: The Model was changed and the QSEE documentation was consulted on how to represent enumeration classes........................... .....

component.description: We used the Google map API to display two maps on our html page one under the other, showing one region each respectively. The maps display several markers for vineyards in each region.
component.problems: There was a problem getting a second map to display under the first as well as getting the mouse over event to work......... ....................
component.solutions:
The solution to get the map was by creating a separate map_options and properly placing the div location at a different width.
.....
